CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 04-08-2016, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: mbr/ 2016/KER/34132 RAJA VIJAYARAGHAVAN.V., J Cri.M.C. No. 4917 of 2016 Dated 4% August, 2016 ORDER The learned counsel for the petitioners prays that the petition be dismissed as withdrawn without prejudice to their right to move afresh. It is also prayed that the original documents produced along with this petition be returned back to him. Permission is granted. This petition is dismissed as withdrawn. Sd/- RAJA VIJAYARAGHAVAN.V., JUDGE kp/-5.8.16
